attributes.action: serve alongside our troops for one tour of afghanastan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Gordon Brown beleives the service of our men and woman in Afghanastan is imperative, and they have sufficient equipment, then i would like to see him take the lead, and serve for just one tour of duty, alongside our fearless troops.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
